Package gui

Class LecturerApprovalController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.LecturerApprovalController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class LecturerApprovalController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The LecturerApprovalController class initializes a chat client and manages a list of exams for a specific lecturer to approve.

      void approveGradeSuccess()
      This function updates the error label and sets the grades table for a successful grade approval.

      This function updates the error label and sets the grades table for exams.

      The function returns an ArrayList of Exam objects.
      void getGrades()
      This function sends a request to the server to get grades for a specific lecturer.

      This function loads the main screen FXML file and sets the scene to it, passing the ChatClient and lecturer instances to the controller.

      • setClientAndLecturer

        public void setClientAndLecturer​(ChatClient client,
                                 logic.Users lecturer)
        This function sets the client and lecturer for a chat session.
        Parameters:
        client - An object of the ChatClient class that represents the client who is setting the lecturer.
        lecturer - The lecturer parameter is an instance of the Users class, which represents a user in the chat system. It likely contains information such as the user's name, ID, and other relevant details.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        The function initializes the table columns and sets mouse click events for various tools.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the FXML file that contains the UI layout for the controller class.
        resources - A bundle of resources, such as strings or images, that can be used by the application. It is typically used for internationalization and localization purposes.

      • goBack

        public void goBack​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This function loads the main screen FXML file and sets the scene to it, passing the ChatClient and lecturer instances to the controller.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent that triggered the method call. It contains information about the event, such as the source of the event and any additional data associated with it.
